1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Split token trees.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Split
7  ( -- * Split
8    splitTokensBy, splitTreesBy,
9    -- * Divide
10    divideTreesBy,
11    divideTreesByBar, divideTreesByColon, divideTreesByEqual,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token            as S
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Parse      as S
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Pattern    as P
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Pattern    as P
20
21-- | Split token list by unquoted word.
22--   If token list contains the word,
23--   pair of /before-list/, /the-word/ and /after-list/ is returned.
24--   If does not contains the word,
25--   original token list is returned.
26--
27--   >>> let Right t = S.toks "b c"
28--   >>> splitTokensBy (== "|") t
29--   Left [ TText  CodePos {..} TextRaw "b"
30--        , TSpace CodePos {..} 1
31--        , TText  CodePos {..} TextRaw "c" ]
32--
33--   >>> let Right t = S.toks "a | b | c"
34--   >>> splitTokensBy (== "|") t
35--   Right ( [ TText CodePos {..} TextRaw "a", TSpace CodePos {..} 1]
36--         , TText CodePos {..} TextRaw "|"
37--         , [ TText  CodePos {..} TextRaw "b"
38--           , TSpace CodePos {..} 1
39--           , TText  CodePos {..} TextRaw "|"
40--           , TText  CodePos {..} TextRaw "c" ] )
41--
42splitTokensBy :: O.Test String -> B.SplitList3e S.Token
43splitTokensBy p = B.splitBy p2 where
44    p2 (P.TRaw x) = p x
45    p2 _          = False
46
47raw :: O.Test String -> S.TTree -> Bool
48raw p (P.LRaw w) = p w
49raw _ _          = False
50
51-- | Split token trees by quoteless token of given string.
52splitTreesBy :: O.Test String -> B.SplitList3e S.TTree
53splitTreesBy = B.splitBy . raw
54
55-- | Divide token trees by quoteless token of given string.
56divideTreesBy :: O.Test String -> [S.TTree] -> [[S.TTree]]
57divideTreesBy = B.divideBy . raw
58
59-- | Divide token trees by vertical bar @\"|\"@.
60divideTreesByBar :: [S.TTree] -> [[S.TTree]]
61divideTreesByBar = divideTreesBy (== "|")
62
63-- | Divide token trees by colon @\":\"@.
64divideTreesByColon :: [S.TTree] -> [[S.TTree]]
65divideTreesByColon = divideTreesBy (== ":")
66
67-- | Divide token trees by equal sign @\"=\"@.
68divideTreesByEqual :: [S.TTree] -> [[S.TTree]]
69divideTreesByEqual = divideTreesBy (== "=")
70
